main.sql: select ab.cat, cast(Cutfio2(ab.fio) as varchar(50)) as rusfio, cast(Transliter(Cutfio2(ab.fio)) as varchar(50)) as Engfio, ab.totall, ab.gloss, ab.sex, ab.agename, ab.agenum, ac.name as rusagedetname, ac.engname as engagedetname from absolute(%IDC%) ab left join lifter_on_competition loc on loc.id_lifter_compet= ab.loc inner join age_class ac on ac.id_agecl=loc.id_agecl order by sex, agenum, gloss desc
